function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vanishing demand due to shelter at home policies","Impact":"Loss of revenue and potential business closure","Mitigation":"Diversification of services, implementation of contactless delivery options","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, autonomous delivery vehicles","People":"Service firms, ridesharing services","Owner":"Service firms, business owners"},{"Description":"Potential for disease transmission through close contact in ridesharing services","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, use of air purification technology","Technologies":"UV-C air purifiers, antimicrobial surface coatings","People":"Ridesharing passengers, drivers","Owner":"Ridesharing services, regulatory authorities"}]}
